'''Stories of You and the Aranara''' is a [[Quest Item]] that can be exchanged for weapon [[Forging Blueprints]] from [[Aravinay]], who is located near the [[Tree of Dreams]] in [[Vanarana (Subarea)|Vanarana]].

One copy of Stories of You and the Aranara can be obtained in these quests:
# After completing the {{Quest|The World of Aranara}}
# Defeating the [[Abyss Lector]] in the {{Quest|Vimana Agama}}
# After fixing the [[Varuna Contraption]] in the {{Quest|Varuna Gatha}}
# After completing the {{Quest|Agnihotra Sutra}}
# After saving [[Rana]] in the {{Quest|In the End, the Forest Will Remember}}

Exchanging all five to Aravinay earns the {{Achievement|The Tale of the Forest}}.
